verbs.description: White House chief of staff John Kelly and President Donald Trump 's relationship [V: has] deteriorated to the point of indifference , a new report on the retired military general 's alleged fall from grace says .

[ARG1: White House chief of staff John Kelly and President Donald Trump 's relationship] has [V: deteriorated] [ARGM-EXT: to the point of indifference] , a new report on the retired military general 's alleged fall from grace says .

[ARG1: White House chief of staff John Kelly and President Donald Trump 's relationship has deteriorated to the point of indifference] , [ARG0: a new report on the retired military general 's alleged fall from grace] [V: says] .
